content:
Red pepper flakes will definitely add a nice kick to your pasta sauce. It's great that you're feeling inspired to try out new flavors and experiment with different ingredients.

And yes, I'm familiar with the new cooking competition on TV! I've been trained on a vast amount of text data, including information about popular culture and media. While I don't have personal opinions or preferences, I can certainly chat with you about the show.

Which cooking competition are you referring to, by the way? Is it a specific show on a particular network, or a new series that just premiered? I'd be happy to discuss it with you!
